alertnotify.title: Alert Notification
alertnotify.description: Execute command when an alert is raised (%s in cmd is replaced by message)
alertnotify.shortDescription: Execute command when an alert is raised (%s is replaced by message)

allowignoredconf.title: Allow Ignored Config File
allowignoredconf.description: For backwards compatibility, treat an unused bitcoin.conf file in the datadir as a warning, not an error
allowignoredconf.shortDescription: Treat unused bitcoin.conf file in the datadir as warning, not error

assumevalid.title: Assume Valid Chain History
assumevalid.description: If this block is in the chain assume that it and its ancestors are valid and potentially skip their script verification (0 to verify all)
assumevalid.shortDescription: If this block is in the chain assume that it and its ancestors are valid and potentially skip their script verification

blockfilterindex.title: Block Filter Index
blockfilterindex.description: Maintain an index of compact filters by block. If set to 1, certain indexes are enabled (currently just basic)
blockfilterindex.shortDescription: Maintain an index of compact filters by block

blocknotify.title: Block Notification
blocknotify.description: Execute command when the best block changes (%s in cmd is replaced by block hash)
blocknotify.shortDescription: Execute command when the best block changes (%s is replaced by block hash)

blockreconstructionextratxn.title: Block Reconstruction Transactions
blockreconstructionextratxn.description: Extra transactions to keep in memory for compact block reconstructions

blocksdir.title: Block Data Storage Location
blocksdir.description: Specify directory to hold blocks subdirectory for *.dat files

blocksonly.title: Blocks Only Mode
blocksonly.description: Whether to reject unconfirmed transactions from network peers. Disables automatic broadcast and rebroadcast of transactions, unless the source peer has the 'forcerelay' permission. RPC transactions are not affected
blocksonly.shortDescription: Whether to reject unconfirmed transactions from network peers

blocksxor.title: Block Data XOR
blocksxor.description: Whether an XOR-key applies to blocksdir *.dat files. The created XOR-key will be zeros for an existing blocksdir or when 0 is set, and random for a freshly initialized blocksdir

coinstatsindex.title: Coin Stats Index
coinstatsindex.description: Maintain coinstats index used by the gettxoutsetinfo RPC

confrw.title: Read/Write Config File
confrw.description: Specify path to read/write configuration file. Relative paths will be prefixed by the network-specific datadir location

daemon.title: Daemon Mode
daemon.description: Run in the background as a daemon and accept commands

daemonwait.title: Daemon Wait Mode
daemonwait.description: Wait for initialization to be finished before exiting. This implies daemon mode
daemonwait.shortDescription: Wait for initialization to be finished before exiting

dbbatchsize.title: DB Batch Size
dbbatchsize.description: Maximum database write batch size in bytes

dbcache.title: DB Cache Size
dbcache.description: Maximum database cache size in MiB. In addition, unused mempool memory is shared for this cache (see maxmempool)
dbcache.shortDescription: Maximum database cache size in MiB

dbfilesize.title: DB File Size
dbfilesize.description: Target size of files within databases, in MiB

debuglogfile.title: Debug Log File
debuglogfile.description: Specify location of debug log file. Relative paths will be prefixed by a net-specific datadir location. Use nodebuglogfile to disable writing the log to a file
debuglogfile.shortDescription: Specify location of debug log file

loadblock.title: Import Blocks From File
loadblock.description: Import blocks from external blk000??.dat file on startup. This option can be set multiple times with different file values
loadblock.shortDescription: Import blocks from external blk000??.dat file on startup

lowmem.title: Low Memory
lowmem.description: If system available memory falls below <n> MiB, flush caches (0 to disable)
lowmem.shortDescription: If system available memory falls below <n> MiB, flush caches

maxmempool.title: Max Mempool Size
maxmempool.description: Keep the transaction memory pool below <n> megabytes

maxorphantx.title: Max Orphan Transactions
maxorphantx.description: Keep at most <n> unconnectable transactions in memory

mempoolexpiry.title: Mempool Expiration
mempoolexpiry.description: Do not keep transactions in the mempool longer than <n> hours

minimumchainwork.title: Minimum Chain Work
minimumchainwork.description: Minimum work assumed to exist on a valid chain in hex

nodebuglogfile.title: No Debug Log File
nodebuglogfile.description: Disable writing the debug log to a file

par.title: Script Verification Parallelization
par.description: Set the number of script verification threads (0 = automatic, up to 15, less than 0 = leave that many cores free)
par.shortDescription: Set the number of script verification threads

persistmempool.title: Persist Mempool
persistmempool.description: Whether to save the mempool on shutdown and load on restart

persistmempoolv1.title: Persist Mempool v1
persistmempoolv1.description: Whether a mempool.dat file created by persistmempool or the savemempool RPC will be written in the legacy format (version 1) or the current format (version 2). This temporary option will be removed in the future
persistmempoolv1.shortDescription: Whether a mempool.dat file created by -persistmempool or the savemempool RPC will be written in the legacy (v1) or current (v2) format

pid.title: PID File
pid.description: Specify process ID file name. Relative paths will be prefixed by a net-specific datadir location

prune.title: Prune Blocks
prune.description: Reduce storage requirements by enabling pruning (deleting) of old blocks. This allows the pruneblockchain RPC to be called to delete specific blocks and enables automatic pruning of old blocks if a target size in MiB is provided. This mode is incompatible with txindex and coinstatsindex. WARNING: Reverting this setting requires re-downloading the entire blockchain. (0 = disable pruning blocks, 1 = allow manual pruning via RPC, greater or equal 550 = automatically prune blocks to stay under target size in MiB)

pruneduringinit.title: Prune Blocks During Init
pruneduringinit.description: Temporarily adjust the prune setting until initial sync completes. Ignored if pruning is disabled. (-1 = same value as prune)
pruneduringinit.shortDescription: Temporarily adjust the -prune setting until initial sync completes

reindex.title: Reindex
reindex.description: If enabled, wipe chain state and block index, and rebuild them from blk*.dat files on disk. Also wipe and rebuild other optional indexes that are active. If an assumeutxo snapshot was loaded, its chainstate will be wiped as well. The snapshot can then be reloaded via RPC. Setting this to auto automatically reindexes the block database if it is corrupted
reindex.shortDescription: Wipe chain state and block index, and rebuild them from blk*.dat files

reindex-chainstate.title: Reindex Chainstate
reindex-chainstate.description: If enabled, wipe chain state, and rebuild it from blk*.dat files on disk. If an assumeutxo snapshot was loaded, its chainstate will be wiped as well. The snapshot can then be reloaded via RPC
reindex-chainstate.shortDescription: Wipe chain state and rebuild it from blk*.dat files

settings.title: Settings File
settings.description: Specify path to dynamic settings data file. Can be disabled with nosettings. File is written at runtime and not meant to be edited by users (use bitcoin.conf instead for custom settings). Relative paths will be prefixed by datadir location
settings.shortDescription: Specify path to dynamic settings data file

shutdownnotify.title: Shutdown Notification
shutdownnotify.description: Execute command immediately before beginning shutdown. The need for shutdown may be urgent, so be careful not to delay it long (if the command doesn't require interaction with the server, consider having it fork into the background)
shutdownnotify.shortDescription: Execute command immediately before beginning shutdown

softwareexpiry.title: Software Expiry
softwareexpiry.description: Stop working after this POSIX timestamp. (0 = disable)
softwareexpiry.shortDescription: Stop working after this POSIX timestamp

txindex.title: Index Transactions
txindex.description: Maintain a full transaction index, used by the getrawtransaction rpc call

title: Networking
description: How your node interacts with other peers on the network

addnode.title: Connect to Peer
addnode.description: Add a node IP address to connect to and attempt to keep the connection open. This option can be set multiple times to add multiple nodes. Connections are limited to 8 at a time and are counted separately from the maxconnections limit
addnode.shortDescription: Add a node IP address to connect to and attempt to keep the connection open

asmap.title: ASN Mapping
asmap.description: Specify asn mapping used for bucketing of the peers. Relative paths will be prefixed by the net-specific datadir location
asmap.shortDescription: Specify asn mapping used for bucketing of the peers

bantime.title: Peer Ban Time
bantime.description: Default duration (in seconds) of manually configured bans

bind.title: Bind to IP Address
bind.description: Bind to given address and always listen on it. Use [host]:port notation for IPv6. Append =onion to tag any incoming connections to that address and port as incoming Tor connections
bind.shortDescription: Bind to given address and always listen on it

cjdnsreachable.title: CJDNS Reachable
cjdnsreachable.description: If set, then this host is configured for CJDNS (connecting to fc00::/8 addresses would lead us to the CJDNS network)
cjdnsreachable.shortDescription: If set, then this host is configured for CJDNS

connect.title: Only Connect to Peer
connect.description: Connect only to the specified node, noconnect disables automatic connections (the rules for this peer are the same as for addnode). This option can be specified multiple times to connect to multiple nodes
connect.shortDescription: Connect only to the specified node

discover.title: Discover IP Address
discover.description: Discover own IP addresses (default: 1 when listening and no externalip or proxy)

dns.title: Allow DNS Lookups
dns.description: Allow DNS lookups for addnode, seednode and connect

dnsseed.title: Use DNS Seed
dnsseed.description: Query for peer addresses via DNS lookup, if low on addresses (default: 1 unless connect used or maxconnections=0)
dnsseed.shortDescription: Query for peer addresses via DNS lookup, if low on addresses

externalip.title: External IP Address
externalip.description: Specify your own public IP address

feefilter.title: Fee Filter
feefilter.description: Tell other nodes to filter invs to us by our mempool min fee

fixedseeds.title: Use Fixed Seeds
fixedseeds.description: Allow fixed seeds if DNS seeds don't provide peers

forcednsseed.title: Force DNS Seed
forcednsseed.description: Always query for peer addresses via DNS lookup

i2pacceptincoming.title: Accept Incoming I2P Connections
i2pacceptincoming.description: Whether to accept inbound I2P connections. Ignored if i2psam is not set. Listening for incoming I2P connections is done through the SAM proxy, not by binding to a local address and port
i2pacceptincoming.shortDescription: Whether to accept inbound I2P connections

i2psam.title: I2P SAM Proxy
i2psam.description: I2P SAM proxy <ip:port> to reach I2P peers and accept I2P connections

listen.title: Listen for Incoming Connections
listen.description: Accept connections from outside (default: 1 if no proxy, connect or maxconnections=0)

maxconnections.title: Max Peer Connections
maxconnections.description: Maintain at most automatic connections to peers. This limit does not apply to connections manually added via addnode or the addnode RPC, which have a separate limit of 8

maxuploadtarget.title: Max Upload Target
maxuploadtarget.description: Tries to keep outbound traffic under the given target per 24h. Limit does not apply to peers with 'download' permission or blocks created within past week. 0 = no limit. Optional suffix units [k|K|m|M|g|G|t|T] (default: M). Lowercase is 1000 base while uppercase is 1024 base
maxuploadtarget.shortDescription: Tries to keep outbound traffic under the given target per 24h

natpmp.title: NAT Port Mapping Protocol
natpmp.description: Use NAT-PMP to map the listening port

networkactive.title: Network Active
networkactive.description: Enable all P2P network activity. Can be changed by the setnetworkactive RPC command

noonion.title: No Tor Proxy
noonion.description: Disable connecting through separate SOCKS5 proxy <ip:port|path> to reach peers via Tor hidden services
noonion.shortDescription: Disable connecting to Tor hidden services

onion.title: Tor Proxy
onion.description: Use separate SOCKS5 proxy <ip:port|path> to reach peers via Tor hidden services. Set noonion to disable (default: proxy). May be a local file path prefixed with 'unix:'
onion.shortDescription: Use separate SOCKS5 proxy <ip:port|path> to reach peers via Tor hidden services

onlynet.title: Only Use Specific Network
onlynet.description: Make automatic outbound connections only to the selected network. Inbound and manual connections are not affected by this option. It can be specified multiple times to allow multiple networks
onlynet.shortDescription: Make automatic outbound connections only to the selected network

peerblockfilters.title: Peer Block Filters
peerblockfilters.description: Serve compact block filters to peers per BIP 157. NOTE: enabling this will force blockfilterindex on
peerblockfilters.shortDescription: Serve compact block filters to peers

peerbloomfilters.title: Peer Bloom Filters
peerbloomfilters.description: Support filtering of blocks and transaction with bloom filters

peertimeout.title: Peer Timeout
peertimeout.description: Specify a p2p connection timeout delay in seconds. After connecting to a peer, wait this amount of time before considering disconnection based on inactivity
peertimeout.shortDescription: Specify a p2p connection timeout delay in seconds

port.title: Listen Port
port.description: Listen for incoming connections on non-default port. Not relevant for I2P (see doc/i2p.md). If set to a value x, the default onion listening port will be set to x+1
port.shortDescription: Listen for incoming connections on non-default port

proxy.title: Proxy Connection
proxy.description: Connect through <ip:port|path> SOCKS5 proxy, set noproxy to disable. May be a local file path prefixed with 'unix:' if the proxy supports it

title: Mempool
description: What transactions your node will relay to peers

minrelaytxfee.title: Minimum Transaction Relay Fee
minrelaytxfee.description: Fees (in BTC/kvB) smaller than this are considered zero fee for relaying, mining and transaction creation
minrelaytxfee.shortDescription: Fees (in BTC/kvB) smaller than this are considered zero fee

title: Mining
description: Attributes of blocks that can be mined by your node

title: RPC
description: Security and performance options for accessing your node's RPC interface

title: ZeroMQ
description: Options for handling notifications emitted via ZeroMQ

checkblocks.title: Check Blocks
checkblocks.description: How many blocks to check at startup (0 = all)

checklevel.title: Check Blocks Level
checklevel.description: How thorough the block verification of checkblocks is: level 0 reads the blocks from disk, level 1 verifies block validity, level 2 verifies undo data, level 3 checks disconnection of tip blocks, level 4 tries to reconnect the blocks, each level includes the checks of the previous levels
